name: Mezereum
Relationship: Antidotes: KALI-HYD.; MERC.Compare: DIRCA PALUSTRIS - Leather wood - (a gastrointestinal irritant inducing salivation, emesis and purgation; cerebral hyperaemia; neuralgic pains, with depression, palpitation, and dyspnoea); MERC.; PHYT.; RHUS; GUAIAC.; SYPH.

Eyes: Pains radiate and shoot downward, with cold feeling and stiffness of bone
Respiratory: Soreness and burning in bones of thorax
Cough; worse, eating, irritation lower than can be reached, on taking a warm drink
Stomach: Burning in tongue, extending to stomach
Chronic gastritis; burning, corroding pain; nausea, vomiting, chocolate color
Nausea felt in throat; better, eating
Head: Stupefying headache in right side
Head covered with thick, leathery crusts, under which pus collects
Hard work to talk
Headache; worse from talking
Roots of teeth decay
Violent neuralgia about face and teeth, running towards ear, at night; worse, eating; better near hot stove
Teeth feel elongated
Affections of external head; scaly eruption, white scabs
Urine: Biting, burning in forepart of urethra at the close of micturition
After urinating, a few drops of blood are passed
Hematuria preceded by cramp pain in the bladder
Red flakes float on top of urine
Abdomen: Swelling of glands with large abdomen in children
Flatulent colic, with shivering and difficult respiration
Nose: Sneezing, coryza, interior of nose, excoriated
Skin: Eczema; intolerable itching; chilliness with pruritus; worse in bed
Bones, especially long bones, inflamed and swollen; caries, exostosis; pain worse night, touch, damp weather
Ulcers itch and burn, surrounded by vesicles and shining, fiery-red areola
Eruptions ulcerate and form thick scabs under which purulent matter exudes
Rectum: Constipation, with hepatic and uterine inertia
Constriction of anus; stitches and prolapse of rectum
Extremities: Pain and burning in tibia and long bones
Pain in neck and back; worse, motion and at night; intolerant of all touch
Legs and feet go to sleep
Ears: Feel too much open, as if tympanum was exposed to the cold air and it blew into the ear

details: Skin symptoms, affections of bones, and neuralgias most important, especially about teeth and face. Bruised, weary feeling in joints, with drawing and stiffness. PAINS OF VARIOUS KINDS, WITH CHILLINESS AND SENSITIVENESS TO COLD AIR. Bone pains. Eruptions after vaccination. Burning, darting sensation in the muscles, subsultus tendinum. Pains shoot upward and seem to draw patient up out of bed. Semi-lateral complaints. PATIENT IS VERY SENSITIVE TO COLD AIR.
